name: それだけ(That's all)[JP/v2]
description:
This game is in Japanese.
I am waiting for a person who makes translation so that more gamers can enjoy it.

-- Method of operation --

Arrow Up/Down/Left/Right Keys: Select
Enter/Z/Space: Decision/Skip
Esc/X: Cancel <- This is important!

F2: show FPS values
F4: FullScreen
F5: Back to Title

- If you want to use a mouse/mobile -
Move the mouse: Select
L Click/Tap: Decision/Skip
R Click/2FingerTap: Cancel <- This is important!

-- Video Policy --

Please be sure to write the name of the author and the title of the work.

(Also, please cooperate with the donation.)

More Details (Japanese):
https://had2apps.com/games/rule_video
